Russia should start being more active on the world stage but we are too weak to interfere in the German or Japanese spheres of influence. Central Asia, with its unstable situation between Alash Orda and Turkestan, is an even more easier region to subjugate. The Central Asian tribes must be brought into the fold!

We have chosen to expand in the Caucasus. We must decide whether we want to conquer the entire Caucasus or limit our operations to Georgia, Azerbaijan or Don-Kuban. If we bite off more than we can chew we can have problems, both internal and international.
We will only secure the Don-Kuban steppes!

Horrible news!  A train full of Russian citizens has been massacred by bandits on the Mongolian section of the Trans-Siberian railroad! Our people are shocked by this act of barbarism and demand an immediate response from the government. This could be an opportunity for us to reassert control over the Far Eastern sections of the railroad but we must tread carefully. Baron Ungern von Sternberg, Supreme Khan of All Mongols, is unhinged and may not take kindly to interference.
We must increase the security on our trains.
Demand a formal apology from the Mongolian government!
Enough! We demand full sovereignty over OUR Trans-Siberian railway!
We shall bring civilization where there is barbarism, send the troops!
The Russian government has asked for a formal apology from the Mongolian government after a train carrying Russian citizens was attacked by bandits on our section of the Trans-Siberian railroad.
We express our deepest regrets, send gifts to the bereaved.
We cannot be held responsible for the actions of bandits.
Baron Ungern von Sternberg has expressed his deepest personal regret over the murder of our citizens on the Trans-Siberian railroad and has sent condolences and gifts to the families of the bereaved.
Okay, but we shall be watching the railroad in future!
Baron Ungern von Sternberg has refused to accept any responsibility for the attack on the Trans-Siberian railroad. Our people are shocked and demand immediate response from government !
He is right, it was not his fault.
Russia demands full control over the railroad

After a train carrying Russian citizens was attacked by bandits on our section of the Trans-Siberian railroad the Russian government has demanded full control over the railway. Russia is an increasingly powerful country and it is doubtful whether we could win in any confrontation with them.
We shall abandon our portion of the railroad.
We cannot be held responsible for the actions of bandits.
We now have full control over the Trans-Siberian railroad. The way to the East now lies open and Russian honour is restored !

Baron Ungern von Sternberg has given a response to our demands: one hundred ethnic Russians have been executed in Ulaan Baator as a warning for us to not to meddle in Mongolian affairs. He has also asserted Mongolia's historic right to Siberia. How should we react?
We shall wipe Mongolia from the map!
Evacuate all Russian citizens from Mongolia and seal the border.
The Russians have declared war and are sending trainloads of troops on the Trans-Siberian railroad! This daring Russian act requires an immediate military response!
Let the Russians come, we shall chase them out of Asia!
We have finally seized control of the Mongolian capital! How shall we deal with these barbarians?
Let the Mongols join us on OUR terms!
Make an example out of them, unconditional surrender!
The Mongols have folded to our demands!
Our alliance with Baron von Sternberg and Mongolia ended in disaster! Now that the self-proclaimed Khan is a Russian puppet there's nothing to gain for us in this conflict.
It's still better than an occupation!
Apparently the rogue Baron is more important to the Mongols than a dignified defeat!
The wretched Russians have seized our glorious capital! Defeat seems near, is it time to submit ?
We have no choice but to submit...
The Baron shall lead us to victory or death!

The Tuvan people are Turks that live next to the Mongols and they have played an important function in Sternberg's empire. Now that Sternberg is out of the picture the Tuvans are demanding freedom. Granting them this wish would greatly weaken the Mongols.
Order Mongolia to release Tannu Tuva!
Tannu Tuva will be Russian once more!
They are still Mongols for all we care!

The Tuvan people are Turks that live next to the Mongols and they have played an important function in Sternberg's empire. Now that Sternberg is out of the picture the Tuvans are demanding freedom. Granting them this wish would greatly weaken the Mongols.
Give them total freedom, once and for all!
Give them limited freedom, they shall remain loyal to us!
Tannu Tuva will be Russian once more!
The Russians have sent us an ultimatum to release the Tuvans!
The Tuvans are now free and at our disposal!
The Russians have sent us an ultimatum to secede Tannu Tuva to them!
Encourage them to plan a plebiscite.
There is no need to vote, all Russians must be under Russian rule!
Send a detachment of troops to Vladivostok to dissolve Transamur!

Following the re-establishment of Russian control over the Trans-Siberian railroad the Russians have announced that the Transmur-Primorsk region is rightfully a Russian province! Can we afford to oppose an increasingly powerful Russia for the sake of Transamur or should we concentrate on China?
Send a warning, Transamur is our protectorate!
A strong Russia would be a better ally than little Transamur.

Following the re-establishment of Russian control over the Trans-Siberian railroad the Russians have decided to enlist the support of some rebellious Transamurian capitalists in order to establish control over the Primorsk territory by force! Can we afford to oppose an increasingly powerful Russia for the sake of Transamur or should we concentrate on China?
A strong Russia would be a better ally than little Transamur.

A most unexpected turn of events! The Japanese have decided that their interests lie in China rather than Siberia and have offered to acknowledge our control over Transamur, and offer us Chinese Central Asia as a sphere of influence, if we help them in their military operations against the Chinese.
Okay, but we demand Northern Sakhalin as well!
We cannot trust the treacherous Japanese!
The Russians have agreed in principle to an alliance aimed against China, but as a precondition of support they want the return of territories taken by Japan during the Russian civil war.
Very well, we are friends now.
No, these territories are rightfully Japanese!
No, and we shall keep an eye on Transamur!
How dare they insult Japan like this? Attack!

Facing the threat of Russian military force and deprived of the support of the local capitalists and the Japanese, Transamur's government is ready to collapse in the face of the popular will. We can now do what we like with Transamur but it has been independent for a long time and will be difficult to integrate into our country. Perhaps some sort of compromise is needed?
No compromise, put their leaders on trial and incorporate Transamur!
Administer Transamur as an autonomous zone for now.

The Japanese are not happy that we are interfering in Transamur's internal politics and have warned us that it is rightfully a Japanese protectorate. However, they have other military concerns at the moment and may not be willing to risk a two front war to protect a colony of minimal importance.
Sever relations with Japan and maintain commercial links with Transamur.
Call their bluff, send in the troops!

Following the re-establishment of Russian control over the Trans-Siberian railway our business leaders are beginning to see that the economic stability of our region depends more on Russia than on Japan. They have gained the support of the Russian governemnt for a plebiscite to see if our people want to rejoin Russia.
Allow it, but rig the results.

The people flock to the polling stations which are heavily protected by police patrols and managed by a large officially appointed bureaucratic staff. They have made their decision.

Kolchak has decided to throw his lot in with Vladivostok's business community. He will allow his country to become incorporated into Russia if he is given the post of Prime Minister as part of a government of compromise.
Establish a government of compromise, Kolchak for Prime Minister!
What is this lunacy? Send in the troops!

We shall keep an eye on Transamur.
We shall send in the army!
Russia has taken hold of Transamur!
Russia has managed to establish its control over the Transamur Republic. Can we accept this diminishment of the Co-prosperity Sphere?
We have more important things to fight over than this!
A strong Russia would be a better ally than little Transamur.

The great Far Eastern port city of Vladivostok is Russian once more! There are many ships in the harbour, including the bulk of Transamur's old navy as well as those owned by private individuals or companies. We shall seize and convert all of the ships in the harbour!
We shall merely use Transamur's old naval designs.
Sell off Transamur's navy and convert the harbour for civilian purposes.
Sell off Transamur's navy and keep the money.

For years our naval chiefs have lamented our lack of presence on the Black Sea, which had traditionally been Russian. Our new Ukrainian allies are very grateful to us for liberating them from foreign domination and should be willing to lease us the Crimea as a naval base in exchange for Russian technical expertise and money.
Leave the Crimea for the Ukraine.

The Russians have asked that they be allowed to lease the Crimea as a naval base for 99 years in exchange for a considerable sum of money and Russian technical expertise. We are under Russian authority now and it would be difficult for us to refuse.
Give the Crimea to the Russians.
No, the Crimea is Ukrainian now!
The Ukrainians have agreed to grant us a 99 year lease on the Crimea!

The great Black Sea port city of Sevastopol is Russian once more! There are many boats in the harbor, including a number of decommissioned warships from the Ukrainian navy as well as a few ships owned by private companies.
We shall seize and convert all of the ships in the harbor!
We shall upgrade the Ukrainian ships.

The Russians have sent us a considerable amount of money and military technology in order to help us in our struggle against our mutual enemies, the Empire of Japan!
Russia and Japan are at war! This could be our chance to extend Mongolian rule into Siberia or China, although we would probably need the backing of one of the sides in the war to feasibly expand.

Baron Ungern von Sternberg has decided that it is time to join our war against Russia and has attacked Russian border defences in Siberia. Mongolian diplomats have offered to cooperate in our alliance more formally, can we trust them?

Stability comes back to Siberia, where barbaric Mongols and the treacherous admiral Kolchak had been trying to drive Russia in chaos. Now our Siberian border is much more secure and we can strengthen ourselves in Siberia.

Give them Crimea and Eastern Ukraine, they have a majority there.
We will punish them, comrades to arms!
Ukrainians, fearing unrest, decided to give us Crimea and Eastern Ukraine. How we shall respond?
We want all of the Ukraine!
We are content with what we have.
Our tolerance for Russian actions has allowed them to take Crimea and Eastern Ukraine.
Ukraine is dead, and we take...
The Russians in Eastern Ukraine and Crimea have rebelled, how much of the weakened Ukraine state will we take?
We have managed to replace the Syndicalist Ukrainian government with a more loyal one.
We have failed to replace the Syndicalist Ukrainian government with a more loyal one.
Russian coup in Ukraine - relations with Russia
Khruschev was dismissed by pro-Russian politicians. Now the future of the Ukraine lies in their hands. What will we do?
The new Malorossian cabinet decided that they will fully join our motherland.
Keep them independent under our supervision.
Malorossia wants to create a union with Russia

The Russian ambassador has approached the minister of foreign affairs about dissolving the Don-Kuban Union. Since the '20s Germany has guaranteed our independence but the Russians look at them as a 'rebellious state'. If we withdraw support for the Cossacks and allow the annexation Russia would be much more eager to cooperate with us. Let's remember that Russia has many means of interfering in Don-Kuban so even if we refuse to talk the situation in the Caucasus can change.
The Russians are right, it's a part of their country.
Germany decided to leave us alone. Now we are defenceless against the mighty Russian armies!
Our skillful diplomacy was able to provoke the Don-Kuban Union into declaring war upon us. Now we can finally reclaim the Don-Kuban union without needing to worry about international reactions.
Novorossiysk and Grozny are coming back to the Motherland.
Germans refuse to give up on Don-Kuban
Despite our best efforts the Germans have refused to withdraw their guarantee of independence of the Don-Kuban Union. We must think about other ways of seizing the Cossack state.
Influence local business leaders to organise a plebiscite!
The country is thrown into chaos!

Russian agitators has fueled popular opinion against the Cossacks. The Russians in our countryside and in our cities have rebelled. Chechens and Ingushens have declared a jihad against our government. The Country is in chaos, what will happen next?
Russian Coup succeeds in Don-Kuban Union
Russians and Caucasian tribes have defeated the Cossacks. the future of the Don-Kuban lies in our hands.
The Don-Kuban Union comes back to the Motherland!
Local business leaders, inspired by the Russians, want a plebiscite concerning the future of our nation. How should we respond?
The people are flocking to the polling stations. Perhaps democracy can work from time to time.
It seems that our peaceful policy towards the Don-Kuban has failed. Now we have to reconsider more aggressive paths.
Perhaps we have to overthrow Cossack rule over Don-Kuban.
Attack only if the Germans won't help them.
The Cossack state is more stable than we thought, we can't defeat them.

Guarantee the security of Azerbaijan and invest in the oil fields.
Who built Baku's oil plants? Make plans for a hostile takeover!

The Russian Government has purchased a massive stake in the Baku Oil Concern and are planning on administering, securing and building up large portions of our oil fields themselves. This would mean that we would lose control over much of our government but would at least present us with a powerful patron.
Invite the Russians to protect and develop Azerbaijan.
Decline the offer, attempt to limit Russian influence!
The foolish Azerbaijani government rejected our attempts to exert our influence over their government. How shall we react to this insolence?

Azerbaijan has accepted our purchase of a majority stake in their state oil industry. This gives us a large enough foothold to either totally dominate the economy and government of the country or attempt to begin plans to reincorporate them into Russia.
Establish control over the Azeri economy.
Start to plan on how best to incorporate Azerbaijan into Russia!

With Russian domination over Azerbaijan stable some members of our goverment think that the time has come for the integration of Azerbaijan into the growing Russian empire. It would be quite easy to pass a series of laws which would ensure that the region is more firmly integrated into Russia.
It is time for Russia to directly rule over Azerbaijan!

Our Russian allies have proposed the creation of a Eurasian bloc to spread the influence of our alliance to other countries in the world, especially in Asia. Yes! We will bring together Europe and Asia!

After the death of Tukhachevsky various Red generals, namely Konstantin Rokossovsky and Kirill Meretskov, decided to continue in his work. The world revolution is still not finished and they want to lead the Soviet Republic in a struggle to bring syndicalism to the entire world.
But the Soviet nation is tired!

Today the XII congress of the VKP(b) has finally begun. Different factions want to assume supreme power over the Soviet Republic in order to reform the existing political and economic systems in ways they deem appropriate. What will happen at the XII congress? Which faction will gain majority?

With contra-revolutionary movements active throughout the entire Soviet state some members of SOVNARKOM are suggesting that it is time for a complete reorganization of the NKVD, renaming it the KGB, to better protect the fruits of the revolutionary movement. This organization should be able to crush any radical contra-revolutionary elements.
Reform the NKVD into the KGB!
The current state of the NKVD is sufficient.
The Bolsheviks have regained control over Russia! What shall Menshevik Georgia's reaction to this new workers' state be?
We shall propose an alliance of proletarian nations!
The ideological gap between us is too great.
The Georgians have sent word that they consider our two states to be alike and that we should ally to promote the global cause of labour. What should we do?
There is to be no reconciliation between our two positions.
The success of the Russian Revolution!

After a long and bitter struggle the Russian workers have finally regained their freedom from their capitalist oppressors! It is time to help them recover and to combine our efforts to free the oppressed around the world!
The Americans offer us a treaty

The American Syndicates officially recognize our state and they offer us a Friendship and Cooperation Treaty. Although their methods seem to be slightly different it seems that we strive towards the same goal, that of freeing the people from the oppression of Capitalism.
We can not sign this just yet.
The Syndicalists of America have officially recognized our newly created Soviet state!
The Soviet government has agreed to sign our Cooperation treaty. This is the beginning of a long and prosperous friendship between the Russian and the American peoples.
The Russians say that they are unable to sign our treaty just yet.
Now that Soviet power is firmly established within the heartland of Russia we can now decide our stance regarding the rest of the world and how far-reaching our goals will be.
We are happy with what we have.
All rightfull russian lands must be ours!
It is time to liberate the oppressed of Eurasia!

Unable to cope with Russian oppression, the Siberian national assembly has declared its independence from Russia. Now that the days of the Russian government are numbered we must decide whether we should bring the revolution to Siberia or let them be for now?
We will free ALL Russian workers!

As expected, the situation in European Russia did take a turn for the worse. The country has collapsed and a new Communist revolution has begun. The Reds have refused to recognize us as a free nation and now we are faced with the necessity of defending ourselves against the Bolshevik threat.
If it's a war they want...

As expected, the situation in European Russia did take a turn for the worse. The country has collapsed and a new Communist revolution has begun. Luckily, the new Bolshevik leadership is more forgiving and Soviet Russia has agreed to recognize our independence.

Unable to cope with Russian oppression, the Siberian national assembly has declared its independance from Russia. Now that the days of the Russian government are numbered we must decide whether we should bring the revolution to Siberia or recognize their independence in exchange for their help?
We will free ALL Russian workers!
Recognize Siberia and offer them an alliance.
Ignore them, they will not last long.

As expected, the situation in European Russia did take a turn for the worse. The country has collapsed and a new Communist revolution has begun. The Reds have refused to recognize us as a free nation and now we are faced with the necessity of defending ourselves against the Bolshevik threat.
If it is war they want...

As expected, the situation in European Russia did take a turn for the worse. The country has collapsed and a new Communist revolution has begun. Luckily, the new Bolshevik leadership seems more than willing to compromise. They offer an official recognition of our independence in exchange for a coordinated effort in fighting the current Russian government.
Excellent, now we are not alone!
Refuse, the Bolsheviks aren't to be dealt with!
The Siberian government has agreed to join forces in the war against the Russian regime.
The Siberian government has refused our generous offer to fight the oppressive Russian regime together. What shall we do?
Let them be, their time will come!
If they aren't with us they're against us!
Now that the Whites are defeated the government needs to decide whether it is safe to remain with the new Soviet regime. Should we sever our ties with them?
It is safer to stay on the winning side.
Now that the Revolution has succeeded, the treacherous leaders of Siberia have decided to abandon our cause.
Let them be, their time will come!
The areas of the former Cossack state are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.

With the rebellious state of Finland finally crushed by the glorious Red Army the time has come to decide its fate. Shall we reincorporate it once more into our motherland or shall we preserve Finnish independence under our supervision?
The areas of the former state of Finland are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.

With Japan's puppet state Fengtien finally crushed by the glorious Red Army the time has come to decide its fate. Shall we reincorporate it once more into our motherland or shall we restore its independence under our supervision? Another course of action could be the establishment of a new order, not just in Manchuria but in China as a whole!
The areas of the former Japanese puppet state Fengtien are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
The areas of the former state of Alash-Orda are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
The fate of Xibei Lianbang Yiyuan

With the warlord state of Xibei Lianbang Yiyuan finally crushed by the glorious Red Army the time has come to decide its fate. Shall we reincorporate the eastern part of it, called Sinkiang, into our motherland or shall we restore its independence under our supervision? Another course of action could be the restoration of Xibei Lianbang Yiyuan.
Restore independent Sinkiang and Xibei Lianbang Yiyuan!
Integrate Sinkiang and liberate Xibei Lianbang Yiyuan!
Integrate Sinkiang and allow China to occupy the rest!
Allow China to occupy Xibei Lianbang Yiyuan!
Sinkiang, once part of the warlord state of Xibei Lianbang Yiyuan, is now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
The areas of the former state of Turkestan are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
The areas of the former state of Primorsk are now firmly integrated into our growing motherland.
The areas once occupied by Mongolia are now firmly integrated into our growing motherland.

With the rogue state of Mongolia finally crushed by the glorious Red Army the time has come to decide its fate. Shall we reincorporate it once more into our motherland or shall we preserve Mongolia's independence under our supervision?
The areas of the former Mongolian state are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
The areas of the artificial state of White Ruthenia, created by the German Empire to weaken Russia, are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
The areas of the artificial state of Ukraine, created by the German Empire to weaken Russia, are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
The areas of the former state of Azerbaijan are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
The areas of the former state of Armenia are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
The areas of the former state of Georgia are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
The integration of United Baltic Duchy
The areas of the United Baltic Duchy, created by the German Empire to further weaken Russia, are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
The areas of the former state of Lithuania are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
The region of Bessarabia, once unlawfully occupied by Romania, is now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
Eastern Galicia, once part of the Austro-Hungarian Empire, is now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.

With the former state of Poland finally crushed by the glorious Red Army the time has come to decide its fate. Shall we reincorporate it once more into our motherland or shall we preserve Polish independence under our supervision?
The areas of the former Polish state are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.

With the stabilization of our motherland we can now start looking beyond our borders. To the south lies the pseudo-capitalist Cossack state led by Hetman Krasnov. Soviet Marshal Budyonny has petitioned our government to instigate a coup in the Don-Kuban Union by using his significant influence amongst the Cossack population. Shall we offer him our support?

Soviet agitators, together with detachments of rebellious cossacks lead by Semyon Budyonny, have turned popular opinion against our regime. Russians, both in the countryside and in the cities, have rebelled. Chechens and Ingushens have also declared a jihad against our government. The country is in chaos. Can we resist the opposition?
The rebels take over the capital!

Today the new Hetman of Don-Kuban Union, Semyon Budyonny, met with our prime-minister and announced that the Don-Kuban Union will become an integral part of the new Russia. Our citizens are happy that marshal Budyonny has achieved a new victory. Glory to the new Red Cossacks!
Our attempt to replace the government in the Don-Kuban union with one loyal to our state failed miserably. What shall we do now?
The Alash Orda's Russians are oppressed!

We have an excellent opportunity to expand our territories and further spread the ideals of Lenin. The leaders of Alash Orda's Russian community have complained to us that they are oppressed under the government's ethnic policies.
Encourage them to secede and rejoin Soviet Russia!
Covert operations will be good enough.
Soviet Russia is stirring up seperatism!
The resurgent Soviet Russia is encouraging our ethnic Russian community to secede from our country and be incorporated into their state.  What shall we do?
We shall fight to maintain the integrity of our lands!
Let them go but maintain our interests in the area.

The prime-minister has announced that, following intense diplomatic pressure on the government of Alash-Orda, their northern areas were allowed to join Soviet Russia! A new grand victory for the Soviet state!
The Alash Orda's Russians are oppressed!

The leaders of Alash Orda's Russian community have complained to us that they are oppressed under the government's ethnic policies. Such an insult to the Soviet people must not go unpunished! We can either immediately declare war upon them or try to use our existing contacts within certain political circles in Alash-Orda to stage a coup.
Encourage them to secede and rejoin Soviet Union!
Covert operations will be good enough.
The Kazakhs have overstepped their bounds, this means war!
Soviet Union tried to accomplish a coup!

Soviet agitators, together with detachments of rebellious Russians led by Talgat Bigeldinov, have turned popular opinion against our regime. Russians, both in the countryside and in the cities have rebelled, leaving the entire country in chaos. How will the situation develop?
Our attempt to replace the government of Alash-Orda with one loyal to our state failed miserably. What shall we do now?
Revolution in Alash Orda was successful!
Members of SOVNARKOM are currently in the capital of the Syndicalist Republic of Alash Orda. Vyacheslav Molotov is holding a speech, where he states that...
...Alash Orda will become part of the Soviet Union!
...Alash Orda will be an ally of the Soviet Union!
The Alash Orda's Russians are oppressed!
The leaders of Alash Orda's Russian community have complained to us that they are oppressed under the government's ethnic policies. Such an insult to the Soviet people must not go unpunished!
Encourage them to secede and rejoin the Soviet Republic!
World revolution, we must liberate them!
Covert operations will be good enough.

Michail Frunze observes a map of Central Asia in light of recent events. A series of border incidents has drawn Central Asia into armed conflict. Should Soviet Russia use this opportunity to liberate the workers and peasants of Central Asia?
We have no interests in Central Asia.

Members of SOVNARKOM are concerned about the unstable situation near our southern borders which may prove detrimental to the development of our southern regions. Armed forces of Alash-Orda and Turkestan are currently locked in a deadly struggle against each other with each nation having clear intentions to dominate Central Asia. This presents us with an opportunity to further spread the ideals of Lenin and bring stability back to Central Asia.
We have no interests in Central Asia.

Marshal Tukhachevsky and his staff are considering the next course of action in order to bring Syndicalism to the entire world. Central Asia is still dominated by religious fanatics based in Turkestan and bourgeois traitors in Alash-Orda with both states locked in a fight to the death. This presents us with an opportunity to further spread the ideals of Lenin and bring stability back to Central Asia.
We have no interests in Central Asia.

Horrible news! A train full of Soviet citizens has been massacred by bandits on the Mongolian section of the Trans-Siberian railway! Our people are shocked by this act of barbarism and demand an immediate response from the government. Baron Ungern von Sternberg, Supreme Khan of All Mongols, is getting stronger. This might be the perfect opportunity to stop his wild and savage men.
We demand full sovereignity over OUR Trans-Siberian railway!
We shall bring civilization where there is barbarism, send the troops!
We must increase the security on our trains.
Soviet Russia demands full control over the railroad

After a train carrying Soviet citizens was attacked by bandits on our section of the Trans-Siberian railway the Soviet government has demanded full control over the railway. Soviet Russia is an increasingly powerful country and it is doubtful whether we could win in any confrontation with them.
We shall abandon our portion of the railroad.

Baron Ungern von Sternberg has responded to our demands: one hundred ethnic Russians have been executed in Ulaan Baator as a warning for us not to meddle in Mongolian affairs. He has also asserted Mongolia's historic right to Siberia. How should we react?
Unacceptable, we shall wipe Mongolia from the map!
Evacuate all Russian citizens from Mongolia and seal the border!

After a train carrying Soviet citizens was attacked by bandits on our section of the Trans-Siberian railway the Soviet government used its wide array of contacts, namely general Sukhbaatar and his lackeys, to instigate rebellion against our rightful government. How will the situation evolve?
The revolution in Mongolia is successful
With aid from the soviet intelligence general Sukhbaatar and his lackeys we were able to overthrow Sternberg and take power in Mongolia!
Another victory for the Soviet intelligence service!
Our attempt to replace the government of Mongolia with one loyal to our state failed miserably. What shall we do now?

Since 1920 the right bank of the Amur river is in the hands of Japan and its lackeys. Now, our Soviet state is finally strong enough to retake our rightful territory. But there are different opinions on how we will liberate this territory. The NKVD wants to start a coup while army leaders just want to send the troops to Vladivostok.
Contact the People`s Far East Party, they will help us plan a coup.
Send the troops to Vladivostok to dissolve Transamur!
The People`s Far East Party coup!

Transamur Syndicalists, supported by Soviet bolsheviks, went to the streets. They are trying to overthrow our rightful government and replace it with this Syndicalist monstrosity. Members of the People`s Far East Party as well as revolutionary parts of our population are trying to take control of Vladivostok. We have already sent for the troops to help us contain this revolution, will the armed forces remain loyal to us?
The armed forces stay loyal, this 'revolution' is crushed!

Following the re-establishment of Soviet control over the Trans-Siberian Railway the Soviets have decided to enlist the support of some rebellious Transamurian Syndicalists in order to establish control over the Primorsk territory by force! Can we afford to oppose an increasingly powerful Soviet state for the sake of Transamur or should we concentrate on greener pastures?
The Transamur Syndicalists were killed by the Transamur army. Our military is demanding that we send an army to Transamur. What will the political leaders of the Soviet state say?

Facing the threat of Soviet military force and deprived of the support of the local capitalists and the Japanese the Transamur government is ready to collapse in the face of popular will. We can now do what we like with Transamur but it has been independent for a long time and will be difficult to integrate into our country. Perhaps some sort of compromise is needed?
No compromise, put the leadership on trial and incorporate Transamur!
Administer Transamur as an autonomous zone.
Soviet Russia has managed to establish its control over the Transamur Republic. Their prime-minister has arrived in Vladivostok. Can we accept this diminishment of the Co-prosperity Sphere?
They're just reclaiming their own land...
We shall keep an eye on Transamur.
How dare they insult Japan like this!? Attack!
The Soviet Union has managed to establish its control over the Transamur Republic. Members of SOVNARKOM have arrived in Vladivostok. Can we accept this diminishment of the Co-prosperity Sphere?
They're just reclaiming their own land...
We shall keep an eye on Transamur, federalists are dangerous.
How dare they insult Japan like this!? Attack!
The Soviet Republic has managed to establish its control over the Transamur Republic. Their prime-minister has arrived in Vladivostok. Can we accept this diminishment of the Co-prosperity Sphere?
They're just reclaiming their own land...
We shall keep an eye on Transamur. Their ideas of world revolution are too dangerous.
How dare they insult Japan like this!? Attack!
We have lost control of our continental provinces. Now our homeland is directly threatened. Maybe we could appease the Soviets by offering them Korea, Port Arthur, Sakhalin and the Kuril Islands.

After we conquered their continental provinces Japan, fearing the might of our armed forces, begs for peace.  They're offering us Korea, Port Arthur, Sakhalin and the Kuril Islands in exchange for the cessation of hostilities between our states.
Now it is time to fullfill our conditions.
The Korean people have suffered for a very long time under the Japanese regime. It is now in our power to grant them their desired independence, is this in accordance with our plans?
Keep it under our direct control.
We have decided that it would be in our best interest if an independent Korea emerges on the world map. How much independence will it really have?
After our defeat in the First Russo-Japanese War of 1905 we had to relinquish Port Arthur to the Japanese empire. Now it is under our control once again.
After the Russians beat the Japanese they gained control of Port Arthur. They have decided that they have no more use for it and instead have given it to us.

The Soviet state has launched a succesful invasion of our country and there is nothing we can do to stop their relentless advance. Most of our commanders suggest that we offer the Soviets an unconditional surrender to prevent more useless deaths.
After our troops reached Mukden the Fengtien republic was forced to sign an unconditional surrender.

The Soviet state has launched a succesful invasion of our country and there is nothing we can do to stop their relentless advance. Most of our commanders suggest that we offer the Soviets an unconditional surrender to prevent more useless deaths.
Kolchak realized that further resistance against us was hopeless. He was left no other choice but to sign the unconditional surrender of his rebellious state.
We have finally seized control of the Mongolian capital! How shall we deal with these savage barbarians?
Let the Mongols join us on OUR terms!
Make an example of them, unconditional surrender!
The Mongols fold to our demands!
Our alliance with Baron von Sternberg and Mongolia ended in disaster! The self-proclaimed Khan has ended up as a Soviet puppet, there's nothing to gain for us in this conflict.
Apparently the rogue Baron is more important to the Mongols than a dignified defeat!
The wretched Russians have seized our glorious capital! Defeat seems certain, is it time to submit?
We have no choice but to submit.
The Baron shall lead us to victory or death!

The Tuvan people are Turks that live next to the Mongols and they have played an important function in Sternberg's empire. Upon hearing of the collapse of his regime the Tuvans are demanding freedom. Granting them this wish would greatly weaken the Mongols.
Order Mongolia to release Tannu Tuva!
They are still Mongols for all we care!

The Tuvan people are Turks that live next to the Mongols and they have played an important function in Sternberg's empire. Upon hearing of the collapse of his regime the Tuvans are demanding freedom. Granting them this wish would greatly weaken the Mongols.
Give the Tuvans total freedom, once and for all!
Give the Tuvans freedom, but they shall remain loyal to us!
The Soviets have sent us an ultimatum to release the Tuvans!
The Tuvans are now free, and at our disposal!
The Russians have sent us an ultimatum to secede Tannu Tuva to them!

During the Russian civil war many rightful Russian lands were occupied by the Kingdom of Finland. The subsequent German intervention in the Russian civil war allowed Finland to keep those territories. Now that the attention of the German empire is turned westwards we can finally focus on regaining Karelia. We can either try to solve this matter diplomatically or use this opportunity as a pretext to finally integrate Finland into our state.

Today, Vyacheslav Molotov has met with our Prime-Minister and announced that the Soviet state wants to take back Vyborg and a part of Karelia. They are offering us monetary and material compensation as well as a guarantee of the future state borders in return. How shall we react?
The Kingdom of Finland has refused our generous offer to transfer Vyborg and a part of Karelia back to the motherland! We must take back our rightful lands by force!
The Kingdom of Finland has agreed to transfer larger parts of Karelia in return for monetary and material compensation as well as the guaranteed security of their new borders!
Armed forces of the Soviet state have inflicted a series of great defeats upon us. We must end this war before they manage to overrun our entire homeland!

With the reconquest of Karelia the government of Finland have declared their desire to end the war between our nations, accepting our sovereignty over the entirety of Karelia in the process. How shall we react?
The Soviet state has agreed to our offer of surrender and the state of war is finally over...
Armed forces of the Soviet state have managed to revert the injustices imposed on us during the Russian Civil War. The entire nation celebrates this enormous victory!

The Soviet state recapturing positions in the Caucasus, previously held by the Russian Empire, has led to a rise of Arabian nationalism originating from Egypt and Hashemite Arabia. Our state and its foreign interests are in grave danger. We must quickly stabilise our eastern borders if we hope to survive the approaching struggle with the hostile Arabian states. The Sultan is planning to send Prince Nihad to propose a non-aggression treaty with the Soviet state.

Our recent achievments in the Caucasus, namely the incorporation of Georgia, greatly disturbed the Ottoman Empire. Prince Nihad recently arrived into our capital with the proposal of a non-aggression pact between our nations in which either side recognizes the current borders between the Ottoman Empire and the Soviet state. How shall we respond to this proposal?
We need security too, sign the Pact!
Include Armenia to sweeten the deal!
Non-Agression pact with Soviets was signed
The airplane of Prince Nihad recently landed in Istanbul. The Prince announced that the non-aggression pact with the Soviet government was signed. The eastern border of our empire is now secure!
A grand success of Ottoman diplomacy!
The Soviet state agrees to sign the pact but they demand the inclusion of our buffer-state Armenia into the deal so that it falls in the Soviet sphere of influence.
The non-aggression pact with the Ottomans was signed

The Ottoman Empire has agreed to include Armenia into our sphere of influence. We have succesfully eliminated the probability of war with the Ottoman Empire, thus freeing our hands to deal with more serious threats to our security in the process. It`s a grand success of Soviet diplomacy!

Thanks to our masterful diplomacy the Armenian state now belongs to our sphere of influence. Now we have to decide our stance towards them. We can either try to establish our control over their government or integrate the entire Armenian state into our motherland.
Try to establish control over the Armenian government!

Secret negotiations between the Ottoman Empire and the Soviet state resulted in our state becoming a part of the Soviet sphere of influence. Now the Soviet state has issued a number of demands towards our state which, if accepted, will result in our incorporation into the Soviet state. Efforts to resist the powerful Soviet state without international backing seem futile.
Seeing no other options the Armenian leadership has accepted our demands
The mad Armenian leadership rejected our rightful demands. How shall we react to this insolence?

Secret negotiations between the Ottoman Empire and the Soviet state resulted in our state becoming a part of the Soviet sphere of influence. Now the Soviet state issued a number of demands with regards to our constitutional system which, if accepted, will mean the end of Armenia as an independent state. Efforts to resist the powerful Soviet state without international backing seem futile.
Seeing no other options the Armenian leadership has accepted all our demands with regards to their constitutional system.

Now that the state of Don-Kuban no longer exists we must choose our stance towards the independent state of Georgia. We can either try to bring them into the fold using the threat of military power or via more subtle ways of negotiation. Another option is to create an independent military bloc with Georgia. What shall we do?

The increasingly powerful Soviet state has once again set its sights on the Caucasus. Now the Soviet state issued a number of demands towards our state which, if accepted, will result in our incorporation into the Soviet state. Efforts to resist the powerful Soviet state without international backing seem futile.
Seeing no other options the Georgian leadership accepted our demands.
The mad Georgian leadership rejected our rightful demands. How shall we react to this insolence?

The increasingly powerful Soviet state has once again set its sights on the Caucasus. Now the Soviet state displayed its willingness to negotiate with our state on terms of our peaceful reintegration into the Soviet state. How shall we respond?
Agree, but Beria must have role in the Soviet government!

Beria has decided to agree with our demands and will allow his country to become incorporated into our motherland if he is given the post of Foreign minister of the Soviet state as part of a compromise.
What is this lunacy? Send in the troops!
The Soviet state offers us an alliance!
The Soviets have sent word that they consider our two states to be alike and that we should ally to promote the global cause of labour. What should we do?
We cannot trust the treacherous Soviets!
A new power in the east!
The government of Georgia has accepted our offer and now a new power in the east is born. With such a powerful alliance emerging on the global stage the future of the proletariat looks promising.

In their arrogance the government of Georgia has turned down our gracious offer, saying that the ideological rift between us is too great for an alliance to form. How shall we react to this humiliation?
They will pay for their foolishness!

Growing tensions between the German Empire and the Commune of France has erupted into a full scale war. This armed conflict presents us with the perfect opportunity to reclaim the territories in Eastern Europe that we lost due to the treaty of Brest-Litovsk as well as the option to spread the proletarian revolution!
We must join arms with France!
We must reorganize our own country.
The Soviets want to join the Internationale!
The Soviet state expressed its intention to join our alliance. For the world revolution!
The areas once occupied by Mountainous Republic of the Northern Caucasus are now firmly integrated into our growing motherland.

With the stabilization of our motherland we can now start looking beyond our borders. To the south lies the pseudo-capitalist Mountain republic led by Caucasian nationalists. Ali Mitayev, the Chechen sheikh from the Mountainous republic has petitioned our government to instigate a coup in the Mountain Republic by using his significant influence amongst local population. Shall we offer him our support ?

Soviet agitators, together with detachments of rebellious mountaineers lead by Ali Mitayev, have turned part of popular opinion against our regime. Russians, both in the countryside and in the cities, have rebelled. The country is in chaos. Can we resist the opposition ?
The rebels take over the capital!

Today the new Head of state of Mountain republic, Ali Mitayev, met with our prime-minister and announced that the Mountain republic will become an integral part of the new Russia. Our citizens are celebrating resotration of the Russian authority over Caucasus.
Our attempt to replace the government in the Mountain republic with one loyal to our state failed miserably. What shall we do now?

The Russian government has proven itself unable to maintain the security of its Siberian territories. We have received word that many local leaders want to secede and join Transamur! There may be international complications but we may never get another opportunity like this!
Claim the land up to Lake Baikal!
